short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to show prayer times based on location courtesy of SABA Islamic Center.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension provides a set of prayer times (& other important times) based on location. The location can either be automatically set or will need to be modified in settings. All prayer times are provided courtesy of SABA Islamic Center with ReKompile as the development partner. 

This app is still being actively developed and will receive updates.

Disclaimer: User's geolocation is collected in order to accurately display prayer times based on location.
